page.title: 02Attitudes
page.content: We wanted to find out what people think of Marston.The questions we asked were: 1.Do you like Marston or not? 2.Why do you like Marston? 3.Do you like the activities in Marston? 4.Have you been in Marston all your life? 5.Are you satisfied with Marston or not? Most people liked Marston.Several because it is peaceful.One had moved here because it was too noisy in Derby.One of us wrote this,"My Grandad and Gran have lived here all their lives.They both like the village because it is quiet.Gran goes to W.I.Grandad likes the pigeon shoot".Others said they liked the village atmosphere also the football,gardening and shooting.
